body.name: Avima 10 oz Anti Colic Baby Bottles, BPA Free, Standard Neck with Medium Flow Nipples (Set of 8)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 5 mins
features: Anti Colic. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up.
Patented Duo-Flo nipple adjusts the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace.
Soft silicone Duo-Flo nipple for a secure latch and easy transition from mom's breast.
All Avima products are made to the highest safety standards and are free of BPA, PVC, phthalates and polycarbonate. Non Perishable.
body.description: Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 8 Pack of 10 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Fits Most Standard Neck Breast Pumps. Only 4 Pieces - Easy to Use. Easy to Clean. Seals Tight - No Leaks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Safety Promise Our products are safe and durable. We are proud that all Avima products meet or exceed international safety standards. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 8 Pack of 10 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Fits Most Standard Neck Breast Pumps. Only 4 Pieces - Easy to Use. Easy to Clean. Seals Tight - No Leaks.

Natural Latch Our natural shape nipple closely mimics the feel of a breast to help ensure a secure latch. Multiple Flows Different flow rates are available so you can use the same bottle as your baby grows. Easy to Clean Only 4 Pieces – Easy to Assemble and Clean! Seals Tight with No Leaks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby Loves These
reviews.reviewText: No leakage, durable nipple, and very easy for baby to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After reading all the reviews about this bottle I wasSpectacle about buying it but i just took the risk and say why not and try it out and my baby loves it the nipple isn’t super big and not to small perfect for my 2 month old and easy to clean. My little has reflux and tend to spit up a lot and have milk leaking from the side but with these bottles she hasn’t had any milk leaking from the side and no spit up or hiccups after feeding, I’ll be purchasing more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dr.Brown without the extras!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has used Dr.Brown since birth (she’s 5 months now). When we switched her to formula we had to use Nutramigen WITH OATMEAL to help her stop spitting up. Because of the thicker consistency it made cleaning the Dr.B bottles even harder then it already was. You can take all tubes out but then you have nothing to reduce air. These resemble the Dr. B nipples, reduces the air intake AND extremely easy to clean. Are the numbers harder to see? Sure but it’s a minor inconvenience.THE 10oz. BOTTLES COME WITH FASTER FLOW NIPPLES. If your looking to buy for a newborn you should either buy the 4oz bottles or the slow flow nipples.***ADDING OATMEAL WAS INSTRUCTED BY OUR PEDIATRICIAN AND SHOULDN’T BE DONE OTHERWISE***

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great transition bottles
reviews.reviewText: Happy with my purchase. Was hesitant at first and was pondering on buying the more popular brand. Glad I went with this set. My 8month old needed to upgrade to bigger bottles & she previously used Dr Brown. Her transition was a breeze! The flow was just right and did not leak like the Dr Browns did. Had I went with the other brands, I’m sure I would have to buy new nipples that’s more suitable for my older baby. Best of all, the nipple for Dr Brown also fit on the Avima 10oz tall bottles and I no longer have to deal with washing all those annoying parts. Reasonably priced and highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO CLEAN
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical because of mixed reviews but I highly recommend these for older babies. Especially if your tired of cleaning Dr. Brown bottles. I bought them for ease of traveling and now use them everyday! It cuts cleaning in half and bottles don’t leak in the baby bag. The nipples do collapse sometimes but doesn’t seem to affect her eating. I highly recommend but not for newborns

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are alright
reviews.reviewText: I would probably return them if they weren’t bottles. I’m giving a 4 star because 3 seems too harsh. It’s a good quality bottle and nipple. The main issue is the bottle is for 10 oz but the fill line is too close to the top. When I try to put the formula in it doesn’t fit. You have to put 2 scoops in then shake then put in the rest. The hole could also be wider so it’s easier to put the formula in. I’m trying to find a 10 oz formula because my boy gets really hungry for night time feeds. Since I only have to use these bottles once a day it’s not too bad. Oh and great price too for the quality if those cons don’t apply to you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time mom, bought so many different types of bottles/nipples. Until I landed on this one. My baby boy was able to latch on to the nipple so easy. No mess easy use and specially it doesn’t drip milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bottles are nice and easy to clean. Not so many parts to clean is a great thing! But the nipple keeps collapsing and I can figure out how to make it stop. Other reviews said you have to have the nipple ring a certain way so that this doesn't happen. And I can't get it to work. It causes a lot of air bubbles which is not good for my baby's tummy.
